biotools.summary: Program that quickly generates haplotypes and/or genotype data for a large number of marker loci (>20,000) for pedigrees of virtually any size and complexity. Haplotypes and/or genotypes are generated using user specified genetic map distances and haplotypes and/or allele frequencies.

bioschemas.name: SimPed
bioschemas.summary: Program that quickly generates haplotypes and/or genotype data for a large number of marker loci (>20,000) for pedigrees of virtually any size and complexity. Haplotypes and/or genotypes are generated using user specified genetic map distances and haplotypes and/or allele frequencies.
